snippet: A federal appeals court ordered a new trial for a former New Orleans police officer who was convicted of manslaughter of a man whose body turned up after Hurricane Katrina.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ordered a new trial for a former New Orleans police officer who was convicted of manslaughter of a man whose body turned up after Hurricane Katrina.

headline.seo: Louisiana: New Trial for Officer in Killing
headline.main: Louisiana: New Trial for Officer in Killing
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Trial For Officer In Killing
